LanguageData.VAEWaste_AteToxicMeatDirect.stages.0.des: I ate some toxic meat. It was, possibly, the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted.
LanguageData.VAEWaste_AteToxicMeatAsIngredient.stages: I ate a meal cooked from toxic meat. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but it still tasted quite poisonous.
